  *   *   *   *   * 

ENVOY WORKPLACE

## The all-in-one solution you need to reimagine the workplace

Envoy Workplace is the only fully integrated workplace solution for all your
workplace needs. Empower your employees to find coworkers, rooms, desks, and
deliveries, while you get an accurate and unified view of workplace occupancy
and space usage data to make confident, cost-saving decisions.

Learn more

Envoy Visitors

## Welcome guests while keeping people, property, and ideas safe

Make visitors feel at ease with an elegantly simple check-in experience. Know
exactly who’s visiting, when, and why with instant document verification. Save
time alerting hosts and printing badges with automated workflows.

Learn more

Envoy Connect

## Visitor management for multi-tenant property owners

Rely on the only intuitive visitor management system designed for property
owners to keep their buildings secure and exceed tenant expectations. Get
accurate data around property utilization and occupancy to drive smarter
decisions.

Learn more

Envoy helps us streamline our sign-in and delivery process which allows us to
maintain a high-security standard at Box."

Alexander Hokokian

Facilities Manager at Box

Read their story

Envoy allows us to document compliance requirements in a way that is
organized, customized, secure, and trackable. If it’s not documented, it
didn’t happen."

Chris Latter

CISO at Giesecke+Devrient

Read their story

## Leading workplaces and properties rely on Envoy

### 9,000+

companies rely on Envoy

### 16,000

workplaces use Envoy globally

### 160,000

people use Envoy to manage hybrid work every (work)day

### 100+

countries with Envoy users

## Streamline your workplace tech with 100+ apps that work for you

Connect to the tools you already use for seamless integration. Envoy’s
workplace platform enables you to connect, share, automate, or build your own
app with anything in your workplace.

Explore integrations

### Aruba ClearPass

Provision unique Wi-Fi network and password details for each Envoy visitor.

### Avigilon Alta formerly Openpath

Automatically distribute credentials and log visitor activity.

### DocuSign

Automatically send visitors documents to sign via DocuSign.

### Eventbrite

Simplify event sign-in by importing Eventbrite attendees into Envoy.

### Google Drive

Connect any Google Drive account to easily store signed legal documents.

### LenelS2 Netbox

Add Envoy visitors to your Netbox activity logs, create a person record, and
notify security.

### Microsoft Teams

Automatically notify employees through a Teams message for every Envoy update.

### Slack

Schedule to come into the office, book desks, and invite visitors through
Envoy without leaving Slack.

Envoy is an all-in-one workplace platform that lets you turn every workplace
location into a collaborative hub where all teams thrive.

Learn more
